unload.stay.context: Part of confirmation prompt that appears when closing with unsaved changes in desktop app

unload.leave.context: Part of confirmation prompt that appears when closing with unsaved changes in desktop app

unload.message.string: Are you sure you want to quit?
unload.message.context: Part of confirmation prompt that appears when closing with unsaved changes in desktop app

unload.detail.string: Any unsaved changes will be lost.
unload.detail.context: Part of confirmation prompt that appears when closing with unsaved changes in desktop app

menu.new-window.context: macOS menu bar item to open a new window

menu.learn-more.context: macOS menu bar item to learn more

context.open-link.context: Context menu item to open link

permission.audio-denied.context: Appears when someone doesn't give the app access to their microphone.

permission.audio-denied-description.string: The app will not be able to record sounds or detect loudness.
permission.audio-denied-description.context: Appears when someone doesn't give the app access to their microphone.

permission.video-denied.context: Appears when someone doesn't give the app access to their camera.

permission.video-denied-description.string: The app will not be able to take photos or use video sensing.
permission.video-denied-description.context: Appears when someone doesn't give the app access to their camera.

permission.macos-instructions.string: To change permissions, open System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Camera or Microphone.
permission.macos-instructions.context: Appears on macOS when someone doesn't give the app access to their camera or microphone

prompts.ok.context: Appears in alert dialogs and confirmation dialogs

packager.loading-preview.context: Loading message for packager preview windows

arm-translation.title.string: Please download the ARM version instead
arm-translation.title.context: Appears when running the app in an environment like Rosetta

arm-translation.detail.string: You're using {APP_NAME} in a translation such as Apple Rosetta. Please install the native ARM version instead as it will perform better and use less battery.
arm-translation.detail.context: Appears when running the app in an environment like Rosetta

in-app-about.desktop-settings.context: Part of the in-app (?) button's menu. Opens desktop settings window.

in-app-about.privacy.context: Part of the in-app (?) button's menu. Opens privacy policy window.

in-app-about.about.context: Part of the in-app (?) button's menu. Opens about window.

in-app-about.source-code.context: Part of the in-app (?) button's menu. Opens link to source code.

in-app-about.donate.context: Part of the in-app (?) button's menu. Opens link to donation page.

desktop-settings.update-checker.context: Label of dropdown to configure the update checker

desktop-settings.microphone.context: Label of dropdown to select active microphone

desktop-settings.camera.context: Label of dropdown to select active camera

desktop-settings.loading.context: Placeholder item in dropdown while data is being fetched

desktop-settings.no-devices.context: Appears in dropdown to select camera or microphone if none were found

desktop-settings.error.context: Appears in dropdown to select camera or microphone if there was an error

desktop-settings.hardware-acceleration.context: Desktop settings option to toggle hardware acceleration

desktop-settings.background-throttling.context: Desktop settings option to disable background window throttling

desktop-settings.bypass-cors.string: Allow extensions to access any website
desktop-settings.bypass-cors.context: Desktop settings option to let extensions bypass normal security stuff

desktop-settings.open-user-data.context: Button in desktop settings to open the user data folder

migrate.title.context: Title of window that does various things to finish an update

migrate.description.string: This is a one-time process that may take a few moments.
migrate.description.context: More information about process to finish an update

migrate.error.string: Some of your data could not be transferred. Please send a screenshot of this window to:
migrate.error.context: Appears when there was an error finishing an update.

migrate.continue-anyways.context: Appears when there was an error finishing an update.

migrate.preparing.context: Status message that appears while finishing an update.

migrate.transfer-desktop.context: Status message that appears while finishing an update.

migrate.transfer-editor.context: Status message that appears while finishing an update.

migrate.transfer-packager.context: Status message that appears while finishing an update.

migrate.finalizing.context: Status message that appears while finishing an update.

update.normal-title.context: Header of update available window for normal update

update.security-title.context: Header of update available window for security updates

update.normal-description.context: Description of update available window for normal update. {appNameVersion} will be replaced with something like 'TurboWarp Desktop v1.2.3'.

update.security-description.string: {appNameVersion} is now available. This release contains security fixes. Updating is highly recommended.
update.security-description.context: Description of update available window for security update. {appNameVersion} will be replaced with something like 'TurboWarp Desktop v1.2.3'.

update.loading.context: Appears in update available window while the changelog is still loading

update.download-button.context: Appears in update available window. Button to download the update.

update.ignore-button.context: Appears in update available window. Button to ignore this update temporarily.

update.permanently-ignore.context: Appears in update available window. Checkbox to ignore this update permanently.
